The writing is quick-paced, the pace keeps you on your toes

A woman who hates cats (Alice Krige) and her son (Brian Krause) have moved into a small town, and must deal with a mean cat-loving witch (Debbieloff Young), an ancient feller creature trying to obtain the Phoenix Gate, an Egyptian god, and Alice’s father and his girlfriend Catherine Deane.
